text: Alcor may refer to: * Alcor (star), also known as 80 Ursae Majoris, a star in Ursa Major very close to Mizar * Alcor Life Extension Foundation * Alcor sailplane, a high altitude pressurized sailplane developed by aeronautical engineer Robert Lamson * ALCOR, a programming language * French name of the anime and manga hero Kouji Kabuto ==See also== * USS Alcor
title: Alcor
